body:
The projections are not doing the naming convention properly:
 
[lee218@ulna2:delete]$ ls usr-2/tce-ulna/packages/fftw/
fftw-3.3.8-fftw-3.3.8-gcc-4.8.5
 
Note the double {name}-{version}. My specification is:
 
      projections:
        ^mpi: '{name}/{name}-{version}-{^mpi.name}-{^mpi.version}-{compiler.name}-{compiler.version}'
        '%gcc@4.8.5': '{name}/{name}-{version}'
        all: '{name}/{name}-{version}-{compiler.name}-{compiler.version}'
title: projections naming convention not working properly in spack stacks
